protein.specific_function: Tyrosine-protein phosphatase which acts as a regulator of endoplasmic reticulum unfolded protein response. Mediates dephosphorylation of EIF2AK3/PERK; inactivating the protein kinase activity of EIF2AK3/PERK. May play an important role in CKII- and p60c-src-induced signal transduction cascades. May regulate the EFNA5-EPHA3 signaling pathway which modulates cell reorganization and cell-cell repulsion.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds
JAK-STAT cascade involved in growth hormone signaling pathway
negative regulation of insulin receptor signaling pathway
regulation of type I interferon-mediated signaling pathway
